amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to clarify that the studies conducted by the Department of Labor concerning the elimination of pay disparities between men and women must include information about, and an analysis of, women of all racial and ethnic backgrounds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
